name: A Warrior´s Last Test
description:
A small Jump and Run with a little story

You a Warrior on you way to your last Test

You went through the hardest already so you got the easiest at last

Pass your last test to recieve your choosen Weapon to be wield and be the next protector of your tribe

yet somethings up?

-Keyboard-

WASD - Move around

Mouse - Look around

Spacebar - Jump

Spacebar x2 -Double Jump

E - Use/Interact

ESC - Pause Menu

-Controller-

Left stick - Move around

Right stick - Look around

X/Square - Use/Interact

A - Jump

A x2 - Double Jump

Start/Option Button - Pause Menu

credits:

Music from Epidemic Sounds

Animation from Mixamo
